Nighthawk

Hi there, this is a document with a poster! It was a very tough one to do

Color Grading

The color grading process on "Nighthawk" was fairly difficult, as we weren't able to have much control over the lighting when shooting (as a no-budget short). A lot of "shaping the image" therefore had to take place in post.
